item.title: ‘She’s not working outside the home’: My mother, 63, inherited $100,000. Is she too old to invest in the stock market?

item.title: SEC says most meme coins are not securities
item.description: The Securities and Exchange Commission issued guidance Thursday evening saying it does not deem most meme coins securities under U.S. federal law.

item.title: Two thieves bought a $500K lottery ticket with a stolen credit card. The victim wants $250K. Does he deserve it?
